data.Name: Renewable freshwater resources flow
data.Definition: The amount of freshwater in billion m3 that Uzbekistan withdraws annually for different purposes.

data.Name: Water stress
data.Definition: This measures water withdrawal intensity- water withdrawal as a percentage of available water resources.  The level of water stress can show the degree to which the country exploits its water resources to meet water demand. The SA also reports on this indicator as part of the clean water goal.

data.Name: Water consumption
data.Definition: the level of freshwater withdrawal by agriculture sector, as a proportion of available freshwater resources.

data.Name: Water consumption
data.Definition: the level of freshwater withdrawal by domestic sector, as a proportion of available freshwater resources.

data.Name: Water consumption
data.Definition: the level of freshwater withdrawal by industry sector, as a proportion of available freshwater resources.

data.Name: Forest area
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Forest area
data.Definition: the share % of the total land area covered by forest. The  indicator shows if Uzbekistan has experienced afforestation or massive deforestation over the years.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Forest stock
data.Definition: It is the volume over the bark of all living trees with a minimum diameter of 10 cm at breast height, including the stem from ground level up to a top diameter of 0 cm (excluding branches) (OECD). The indicator provides information about wood resources measured in millions of cubic metres (m3). It also provides the basis for estimating the amount of CO₂ the forest contains.
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Land area
data.Definition: Uzbekistans surface area in thousand Km2, excluding area under inland water bodies (rivers and lakes).
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Agriculture land
data.Definition: the land area  in thousand Km2 that is arable (temporary crops), under permanent crops and permanent pastures

data.Name: Agriculture land
data.Definition: the share % of land area that is arable (temporary crops), under permanent crops and permanent pastures

data.Name: Cultivated (arable) land
data.Definition: part of the agricultural land that is cultivated annually (arable land) for growing food and feed.

data.Name: Natural gas production and consumption
data.Definition: Volume (billion m3) of natural gas produced annually in uzbekistan
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Natural gas production and consumption
data.Definition: Volume (billion m3) of natural gas consumed annually in Uzbekustan
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Protected areas
data.Definition: national parks, nature reserves and wildlife sanctuaries designated by national authorities as scientific reserves with limited public access
data.Source: Statistics Agency under the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan

data.Name: Threatened species
data.Definition: critically endangered and vulnerable  plant species i.e., those plants in danger of extinction or soon likely to be.

data.Name: Threatened species
data.Definition: critically endangered and vulnerable  animal species i.e., those animals in danger of extinction or soon likely to be. Number of species  threatened by extinction among species assessed or known.

data.Name: Annual mean temperature
data.Definition: annual mean surface temperature expressed in degree Celsius (°C).
